Delete.WhereClause: uid_selecteditem in ( select primarykey() from candidate where isconnectable(primarykey(), parentkey, -- start values: the current value ((primarykey() = (from candidate select current primarykey())))) )

ForeachRow.WhereClause: isconnectable(primarykey(), parentkey, -- start values: the current value ((primarykey() = (from candidate select current primarykey())) ))

ActionSequence.Condition: 0 = select count() from selecteditemscollection where (uid_selecteditem = from Candidate select current primarykey())

InsertValue.Value: from Candidate select current isnull( candidatetargetvalue(), primarykey() )
